message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes packed with features that are sure to enhance your experience. For this exceptional product, I propose a price of $150. I believe it offers great value considering its quality and the benefits it provides. Let me know if you have any questions or if you'd like to discuss further.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the detailed description. However, $150 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. Let me know what you think.
